column4: does brasero have a problem with burning iso's to regular cd's? it was fine doing a dvd image but the regular cd just hangs
depends how big the iso is really??
it's 600 megs or so, it just hangs at "preparing to write"
I don't know how else to do an image to install ubuntu on the other pc
it shouldnt have a problem burning iso's to a disc
make sure the burn speed is set low?
how long has it been doing this like, everytime, possibly is the iso?? have check the hash
every time I try, even if the iso is somehow downloaded wrong, it should still try to burn it to the disk right?
yeah it should burn anything that is formated as .iso
then it's some issue with my burner or brasero or something, heh.
yeah it could have problems with your burner,, kinda weird tho
does it recognize a disc when you put it in nyaa_
yeah it recognizes that it's a blank disc
I would recomend synaptic and installing k3b, its for kde but see if it burns at least
